name: ConditionalFormatRule
description: Represents a rule, for all traditional ruleformat pairings.

properties.name: formula1
properties.description: The formula, if required, to evaluate the conditional format rule on.

properties.name: formula1Local
properties.description: The formula, if required, to evaluate the conditional format rule on in the user's language.

properties.name: formula1R1C1
properties.description: The formula, if required, to evaluate the conditional format rule on in R1C1-style notation.

properties.name: formula2
properties.description: The formula, if required, to evaluate the conditional format rule on.

properties.name: formula2Local
properties.description: The formula, if required, to evaluate the conditional format rule on in the user's language.

properties.name: formula2R1C1
properties.description: The formula, if required, to evaluate the conditional format rule on in R1C1-style notation.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fills the proxy object created in JavaScript layer with property and object values specified in the parameter.

parameters.name: param
parameters.description: Accepts parameter and relationship names as delimited string or an array. Or, provide [loadOption](loadoption.md) object.
